description._content: Paris Exposition: Palace of Social Economy and Congress, Paris, France, 1900. Palais de l'Economie Sociale et des Congres Brooklyn Museum Archives, Goodyear Archival Collection (S03_06_01_014 image 1541). It helps us to know how our visitors work with our images, so if you use it, we'd love to know how! Drop us a line by leaving a comment here or email our archivist: library@brooklynmuseum.org If you like these Paris shots, we've got a short video on YouTube with our Head of Digital Collections and Services talking about them in detail.
